original_text: And though they hide themselves in the top of Carmel, I will search and take them out thence; and though they be hid from my sight in the bottom of the sea, thence will I command the serpent, and he shall bite them:
korean_text: 갈멜 산 꼭대기에 숨을지라도 내가 거기에서 찾아낼 것이요 내 눈을 피하여 바다 밑에 숨을지라도 내가 거기에서 뱀을 명령하여 물게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: I will search and take them out thence
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 거기서 그들을 찾아내고 데려갈 것이라

sentences.original_text: and though they be hid from my sight
in the bottom of the sea
thence will I command the serpent
